Update a project

<RequestSchema

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"example":"My Updated Novel","description":"Project title"},"description":{"type":"string","example":"An updated thrilling adventure story","description":"Project description"}},"title":"UpdateProjectRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Project updated successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"proj-123"},"slug":{"type":"string","example":"my-novel"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"My Novel"},"description":{"type":["string","null"],"example":"A thrilling adventure story"},"username":{"type":"string","example":"johndoe"},"createdDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"},"updatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"}},"required":["id","slug","title","username","createdDate","updatedDate"],"title":"Project"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid input","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"An error occurred"}},"required":["error"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Not authenticated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"An error occurred"}},"required":["error"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Access denied","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"An error occurred"}},"required":["error"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"Project not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"An error occurred"}},"required":["error"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
